articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: ZEEKR Intelligent Technology Holding (NYSE:ZK): Revisiting Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness. ZEEKR Intelligent Technology Holding (NYSE:ZK) has been drifting slightly lower over the past 3 months, even as revenue and net income have grown at a solid clip. That mismatch raises some interesting valuation questions. See our latest analysis for ZEEKR Intelligent Technology Holding. articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: China’s Sprint for Tech Dominance Can’t Hide an Economy Full of Holes. A self-sufficiency push has made China a tougher competitor to the U.S., but it comes with enormous waste.
